4. Place 4 - Sean Shope

Place 4 - Sean Shope
====================

![Darlene Freed](https://grapevinetexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3221)**Email:**[**Sean Shope**](mailto:sshope@grapevinetexas.gov) **City Council** - Place 4

* Elected to Place 4 in 2025
* Term expires: 2028

Current Committees

* City Council Audit Committee
* Council Liaison - Housing Authority Advisory Board
* Council Liaison - Metroport Teen Court Advisory Board
* Council Liaison, 1st Alternate - Building Board of Appeals
* Council Liaison, 1st Alternate - Golf Course Advisory Board
* Crime Control and Prevention District Board
* Grapevine 4B Economic Development Corporation Board

Community Organization Service 

* Grapevine Historic Preservation Past Chair
* Grapevine Chamber of Commerce, current member
* Grapevine Walk of Honor President
* Grapevine Ex Students Treasurer
* Grapevine Education Past Chair

Personal

* Grapevine resident for 27 years
* Married to Paula
* Texas A&M University
* Woodland Heights Church Deacon

* [Online  
  Payments](https://grapevinetexas.gov/386/epay.aspx)

* [Employment](https://agency.governmentjobs.com/grapevinetx/default.cfm)

* [Solid Waste  
  & Recycling](https://grapevinetexas.gov/795)

* [Meeting VideoS](https://grapevinetexas.gov/1059/Agendas-Minutes)

* [Report  
  An Issue](https://grapevinetexas.gov/389)

* [Media](https://grapevinetexas.gov/1417)
